name: ucdp_fatality_One-sided_YYYY.tif
title: UCDP One-sided Conflict Events deaths
description: Number of total fatalities per 0.01 decimal degree grid cell resulting from one-sided conflict event using UCDP Georeferenced Event Dataset (GED) global version 17.1. Definition of ucdp violence type can be found: http://www.pcr.uu.se/research/ucdp/definitions/

extract_types_info.sum: sum of fatalities per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.mean: average of fatalities per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum fatalities per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum fatalities per unit of analysis

options.variable_description: the best estimate of total fatalities resulting from an one-sided conflict event

extras.citation:
Sundberg, Ralph, and Erik Melander, 2013, “Introducing the UCDP Georeferenced Event Dataset”, Journal of Peace Research, vol.50, no.4, 523-532 
 Croicu, Mihai and Ralph Sundberg, 2017, “UCDP GED Codebook version 17.1”, Department of Peace and Conflict Research, Uppsala University
